column1:
"what do you think of the browns,"
"Oh please oh god please don't pick me,"

If you want to impress the Browns Scouts, just take off your pants and show them your vagina.
It worked for Deshone Kizer.

None of these quarterbacks in this class are impressive except for Luke Falk and Lamar Jackson. Definitely would not take a QB with the 1st two picks.. maybe one of these guys in later round. 
#GoBrowns
